backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing loan application management with role-based access control (admin/user), user profiles, and loan application CRUD operations with status tracking (pending/approved/rejected).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting deployment error investigation feature with references to App.tsx, authorization components, and test ID REQ-12.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities for the Ease Loan application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with financial services color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Ease Loan application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, application form, and admin dashboard, plus ThemeProvider, ProfileSetupModal, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied UI component displaying error card with shield icon and return-to-home button for unauthorized admin page access attempts.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header (logo, navigation, conditional admin link, login button), main content outlet, and footer with company contact information.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component managing Internet Identity login/logout with loading states, error handling, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog prompting authenticated users without profiles to enter their name, with form validation and non-dismissible behavior until completed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with identity-based authentication, admin token initialization, and automatic query invalidation on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllLoanApplicat: React Query hook fetching all loan applications from backend, enabled only when actor is available and not fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React Query hook that fetches the current user's profile from the actor, with loading states dependent on actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout, managing identity state and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: React Query hook that checks if the current caller has admin privileges by querying the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useLoanApplication.ts: React Query mutation hook for submitting loan applications with validation, query invalidation, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: React Query mutation hook for saving user profile data with success/error toast notifications and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateApplicationS: React Query mutation hook for updating loan application status with query invalidation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm financial services color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard displaying loan application statistics, table with status management, and access control requiring authentication and admin privileges.
frontend/src/pages/ApplicationFormPage.t: Loan application form page with validation, authentication checks, and success confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, features grid showcasing loan benefits, and call-to-action buttons for applying.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography, container settings, border radius variables, shadows, and animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project state file for Ease Loan website tracking implemented features including homepage, loan application form, admin authentication with Internet Identity, and admin dashboard, with a known issue regarding login functionality.
